Ui.TinyLouvre.OnlineModeDisclaimer.1: Tiny Louvre can automatically fetch new paintings from other users on the internet.
Ui.TinyLouvre.OnlineModeDisclaimer.2: These paintings are not moderated, and their content may not be suitable for all players.
Ui.TinyLouvre.OnlineModeDisclaimer.3: Would you like to enable Tiny Louvre's Online Mode?
Ui.TinyLouvre.OnlineModeDisclaimer.4: (This can be changed later in the mod's options menu)
